text: Why does min or max on two numbers  create memory allocations.  Is there a way to prevent that.

elements.text: Why does min or max on two numbers  create memory allocations.  Is there a way to prevent that.

text: Can we cross post this publicly to <https://discourse.julialang.org|Discourse> for further visibility? React with :bridge: on the message above to approve. <https://github.com/JuliaCommunity/SlackBridge/blob/main/README.md#faq|More info here>

```julia> @btime min($(Ref(1))[], $(Ref(2))[])
  1.369 ns (0 allocations: 0 bytes)
1```
I don't see any allocations :thinking_face:
I maybe one of them is the comparing to the last or first of an array.   I see it when I run the mem trace on my program.
